SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation

Class ProductServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation.ProductServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductService
@Service public class ProductServiceImpl extends Object implements ProductService
This class is an implementation of the ProductService interface and provides various methods for managing products being sold on ShopPeas such as retrieving product details, adding new products, updating existing products, and fetching product images.

      public ProductDTO getProductById(String pid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves product details for a given product ID (PID).
      Specified by:
      getProductById in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      pid - The product ID of the product whose details are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A ProductDTO object containing the product details.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to retrieve product details.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.

      Retrieves a list of all products in the system.
      Specified by:
      getAllProducts in interface ProductService
      Returns:
      A list of Product objects representing all the products in the system.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to retrieve all products.

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(String PID, Map<String,Object> data) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates an existing product's details using the given product ID and the data to be updated.
      Specified by:
      updateProduct in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      PID - The product ID of the product to be updated.
      data - A map containing the product data to be updated (field names as keys and values to update).
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to update the product.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.

    • getImageURLByProductName

      public String getImageURLByProductName(String productName) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves the image URL for a product based on its name.
      Specified by:
      getImageURLByProductName in interface ProductService
      Parameters:
      productName - The name of the product whose image URL is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The image URL of the product if available, otherwise null.
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - If an error occurs during the execution of a task to retrieve the image URL.
      InterruptedException - If the thread executing the task is interrupted while waiting for the result.
